resources.string: EmpowHer aims to empower girls and women by providing them information about different opportunities they can take up to be and feel empowered.
Get regular updates about: Scholarships for girls studying in school, Free technical workshops and events for girls, Scholarships, Events for college students, free courses online.
Get regular updates about: Career re-entry opportunities for women who took a break from work, New courses to improve their knowledge base and Seek for better levels at organizations.
Get regular updates about: Vocational training for women, Opportunities to sell home made products online, Information about government loan schemes.
